summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.7°C) and feels like temperature (down 1.7°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 23%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 14026 lux), cloud levels (up 748 m), and pressure (up 7 mbar).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), light levels (up 12243 lux), cloud levels (up 426 m), and outside temperature (up 2.5°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, very clammy and humid and slight breezes. Drizzle or light rain possible, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and some sunny spells will occur. Weather could become unsettled.
